page.title: 11The Bedwellty Show.
page.content: The main annual event to take place in the Blackwood area, is the Bedwellty Agricultural Show. It is held on Blackwood Showfield every year during August. It is usually opened by the Mayor of Islwyn and is always very successful. Last year, there were many competitions for horses, cows, sheep and pigs. The winners were paraded around the ring by their owners. There were also sheep dog trials where the dogs had to round up the sheep and see them safely into a pen. At the Bedwellty show there are usually lots of stalls which sell sweets, cakes, hot dogs and drinks. There is a brass band that parades around the field playing music, and sometimes they have an aeroplane display and sky divers.
